Sequence Information.Peptide Name: VpBD (V. philippinarum big defensin; natural AMPs; mollusca/molluscs/mollusks, invertebrates, marine animals; 3S=S; UCSS1a)

Literature Information.Literature: Expression: after Vibrio anguillarum challenge, the mRNA transcript of VpBD increased 7.4 fold during the first 24 hr and 3.9 fold after 96 h.Activity: Recombinant peptide displayed activity against both G+ S. aureus (MIC 1.64-3.28 uM), M-luteus (MIC >26.26 uM), Bacillus sp. (MIC 13.13-26.26 uM) and G- bacteria V. anguillarum (MIC 13.13-26.26 uM), E-cloacae (MIC >26.26 uM), V. ichthyoenteri (MIC 3.28-6.56 uM), P. putida (MIC 1.64-3.28 uM), P-mirabilis (MIC>26.26 uM), and Enterobacter sp. (MIC 13.13-26.26 uM).Recombinant production:bacteria:Escherichia coli: a recombinant BL21 (DE3)-plysS expression system was established for production of the peptide. 10/30/2010; 3/2023.
Literature Information.Author: Zhao J, Li C, Chen A, Li L, Su X, Li T.2010
Literature Information.Title: Molecular characterization of a novel big defensin from clam Venerupis philippinarum
